price: Yemwe abemeye! Nimwifashishe ukwihangana n’iswala.[1] Mu by’ukuri, Allah ari kumwe n’abihangana (abatera inkunga ndetse anabafasha gutunganirwa).
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱسۡتَعِينُواْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ
footnotes: [1] Reba uko twasobanuye umurongo wa 3 muri iyi Surat.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū is'taʿīnū bil-ṣabri wal-ṣalati inna al-laha maʿa al-ṣābirīna
